OverrideId.description: The canonical (synthetic) Xfuze Override id if identifiable and has some unique key e.g Override_D365_987654

OverrideKey.description: The native override number if identifiable and has some unique key e.g 987654

IsAutomaticApproval.description: Is this an automatic override approval? e.g Y

OriginalUserId.description: The original userId on the original transaction

OverrideType.description: The type of the override e.g Price, Discount, Payment etc

OverrideReasonCode.description: The reason code for the override

OverrideReasonDesc.description: The reason description for the override

OriginalValue.description: The original value before the override e.g original price

Value.description: The new overridden value post the override e.g adjusted price

Lineage.description: The event lineage (e.g eventId, asOf) that lead to the observed/derived state of this object/data part
